consider the following APIs and choose the one that best suits your app’s implementation:

If you use StoreKit views such as

you don’t need to call any other API to initiate a purchase. StoreKit manages the purchase action automatically, including presenting the purchase confirmation UI. For more information, see
Call the

method when a customer initiates a purchase, either within your app or after selecting a promoted in-app purchase on the App Store. This method brings up the system-confirmation sheet. The user can confirm to complete the transaction or cancel it.
Include the purchase options to provide additional information about the purchase, such as:
to associate the purchase with the resulting transaction
, if the customer is redeeming a promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription
, if the customer is purchasing more than one of the product

abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your macOS app.
Declare the user interface and behavior for your app on every platform.
Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your iOS, iPadOS, or tvOS app.
Support In-App Purchases and interactions with the App Store.
Information about a product that you configure in App Store Connect.
Error information for product purchase errors.
Optional settings for a product purchase that add account information, purchase details, and offers, or that specify behaviors.
Sets a UUID to associate the purchase with an account in your system.
Applies a promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
Indicates the quantity of items the customer is purchasing.
Simulates an Ask to Buy scenario when testing your app in the sandbox environment.
The result of a purchase.

Processes a purchase for the product.

A view that merchandises an individual In-App Purchase product.
An action that starts an In-App Purchase.
StoreKit In-App Purchase error codes.
A view that merchandises a collection of In-App Purchase products.
A view that merchandises a collection of auto-renewable subscription options that belong to the same subscription group.
Present win-back offers to eligible customers in your app with the win-back offer sheet or by implementing custom merchandising.

abstract.text: Show promoted In-App Purchases on your product page and handle purchases that customers initiate on the App Store.
